data.text: Mgbe ụmụ Izrel si nʼala Ijipt pụta,
Osimiri hụrụ ya, gbaa ọsọ,114:3 Ọpụ 14:21
Ugwu ukwu niile wụliri elu dịka ebule;
Gịnị mere gị oke osimiri, i ji na-agba ọsọ?
Gịnị na-eme unu, ugwu ukwu niile unu ji na-awụli elu dịka ụmụ ebule?
Ka ụwa niile maa jijiji nʼihu Onyenwe anyị,
onye mere ka oke nkume ghọọ ọdọ mmiri,
